INSERT INTO S_C_CLIENT_VER_SUB ( VERSION, ITEMNAME, ITEMENNAME, ITEMDESC, CZID, CREATEUSER, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, ENABLEFLAG, EXFIELD01, EXFIELD02, MAINID, MAINCODE, VERSIONNUM, VERSIONTYPE, MINSUPPORTNUM, UUIDCODE, CLIENTTYPE, CLIENTADAPTER, RUNENV, MERGEID, BRANCHID, FORCEFLAG, DEVINFO, DEVSTARTTIME, DEVENDTIME, SVNINFO, REQDESC, RELEASETIME, RELEASEINFO, RELEASEDESC, FULLFILEPATH, FULLFILENAME, FULLFILESIZE, FULLFILEMD5, INCFILEPATH, INCFILENAME, INCFILESIZE, INCFILEMD5, DOWNCOUNT, DOWNLASTTIME ) VALUES ( 1, #itemName#, #itemEnName#, #itemDesc#, #czId#, #createUser#, #createTime#, #updateUser#, #updateTime#, #enableFlag#, #exfield01#, #exfield02#, #mainId#, #mainCode#, #versionNum#, #versionType#, #minSupportNum#, #uuidCode#, #clientType#, #clientAdapter#, #runEnv#, #mergeId#, #branchId#, #forceFlag#, #devInfo#, #devStartTime#, #devEndTime#, #svnInfo#, #reqDesc#, #releaseTime#, #releaseInfo#, #releaseDesc#, #fullFilePath#, #fullFileName#, #fullFileSize#, #fullFileMd5#, #incFilePath#, #incFileName#, #incFileSize#, #incFileMd5#, #downCount#, #downLastTime# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ITEMID

SELECT SEQ_S_C_CLIENT_VER_SUB.NEXTVAL AS ITEMID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO S_C_CLIENT_VER_SUB ( ITEMID, VERSION, ITEMNAME, ITEMENNAME, ITEMDESC, CZID, CREATEUSER, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, ENABLEFLAG, EXFIELD01, EXFIELD02, MAINID, MAINCODE, VERSIONNUM, VERSIONTYPE, MINSUPPORTNUM, UUIDCODE, CLIENTTYPE, CLIENTADAPTER, RUNENV, MERGEID, BRANCHID, FORCEFLAG, DEVINFO, DEVSTARTTIME, DEVENDTIME, SVNINFO, REQDESC, RELEASETIME, RELEASEINFO, RELEASEDESC, FULLFILEPATH, FULLFILENAME, FULLFILESIZE, FULLFILEMD5, INCFILEPATH, INCFILENAME, INCFILESIZE, INCFILEMD5, DOWNCOUNT, DOWNLASTTIME ) VALUES ( #itemId#, 1, #itemName#, #itemEnName#, #itemDesc#, #czId#, #createUser#, #createTime#, #updateUser#, #updateTime#, #enableFlag#, #exfield01#, #exfield02#, #mainId#, #mainCode#, #versionNum#, #versionType#, #minSupportNum#, #uuidCode#, #clientType#, #clientAdapter#, #runEnv#, #mergeId#, #branchId#, #forceFlag#, #devInfo#, #devStartTime#, #devEndTime#, #svnInfo#, #reqDesc#, #releaseTime#, #releaseInfo#, #releaseDesc#, #fullFilePath#, #fullFileName#, #fullFileSize#, #fullFileMd5#, #incFilePath#, #incFileName#, #incFileSize#, #incFileMd5#, #downCount#, #downLastTime# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE S_C_CLIENT_VER_SUB SET VERSION=VERSION+1, ITEMNAME=#itemName#, ITEMENNAME=#itemEnName#, ITEMDESC=#itemDesc#, UPDATEUSER=#updateUser#, UPDATETIME=#updateTime#, ENABLEFLAG=#enableFlag#, EXFIELD01=#exfield01#, EXFIELD02=#exfield02#, VERSIONNUM=#versionNum#, VERSIONTYPE=#versionType#, MINSUPPORTNUM=#minSupportNum#, CLIENTADAPTER=#clientAdapter#, RUNENV=#runEnv#, MERGEID=#mergeId#, BRANCHID=#branchId#, FORCEFLAG=#forceFlag#, DEVINFO=#devInfo#, DEVSTARTTIME=#devStartTime#, DEVENDTIME=#devEndTime#, SVNINFO=#svnInfo#, REQDESC=#reqDesc#, RELEASETIME=#releaseTime#, RELEASEINFO=#releaseInfo#, RELEASEDESC=#releaseDesc#, FULLFILEPATH=#fullFilePath#, FULLFILENAME=#fullFileName#, FULLFILESIZE=#fullFileSize#, FULLFILEMD5=#fullFileMd5#, INCFILEPATH=#incFilePath#, INCFILENAME=#incFileName#, INCFILESIZE=#incFileSize#, INCFILEMD5=#incFileMd5#, DOWNCOUNT=#downCount#, DOWNLASTTIME=#downLastTime# WHERE ITEMID=#itemId# AND VERSION=#version#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM S_C_CLIENT_VER_SUB WHERE ITEMID=#itemId# AND VERSION=#version#

DELETE FROM S_C_CLIENT_VER_SUB WHERE ITEMID IN
#itemIdList[]#
sqlMap.sql: SELECT t.ITEMID, t.ITEMNAME, t.ITEMENNAME, t.MAINID, t.MAINCODE, t.VERSIONNUM, t.UUIDCODE

WHERE 1=1
t.ITEMID=#itemId# t.ITEMID<>#itemId_notexist# t.ITEMID IN ($itemId_in$) t.ITEMNAME=#itemName# t.ITEMENNAME=#itemEnName# t.ITEMNAME like #itemName_like# t.ITEMENNAME like #itemEnName_like# t.MAINID=#mainId# t.MAINCODE=#mainCode# t.VERSIONNUM=#versionNum# t.UUIDCODE=#uuidCode# t.CZID=#czId# t.CLIENTTYPE=#clientType# t.FORCEFLAG=#forceFlag#
t.VERSIONNUM>=#startNum# t.VERSIONNUM<=#endNum#
t.ENABLEFLAG=#enableFlag# t.EXFIELD01=#exfield01# t.EXFIELD02 like #exfield02#
